name: Old Voyage
description:
Controller required to play.

Game in BETA phase.

You play as Clover, a man with a midlife crisis running away from home in a hot air balloon with only one mission in mind: living new experiences and taking pictures along the way.  He wants to fill a whole album so that he can look at it when he grow old(er?).

Play a collection of minigames, meet  colorful characters , explore a stylized world and follow Clover's  story!

You control Clover's hands individually with the triggers in your controller and perform contextual actions in each minigame. Waving, throwing rocks, riding a bike, playing rock-paper-scissors. Clover can do it all.
